access_token.description:
Acces token that can be used to authenticate the API endpoints throught a HTTP Header:
"Authorization: Bearer {access_token}"

expires_in.description: Number of seconds wich the access_token will be valid

amount-available.description: Available amount of cash to distribute among projects

amount-committed.description: Maximum total amount of cash that was available to distribute among projects

amount-peers.description: Amount of cash already distribute among projects

amount-remaining.description: Amount of cash still available for distribute among projects

applies.description: Text description about which kind of projects will be selected for the matchfunding call

call-location.description: Custom location value for the call

call-url.description: URL where to visualize the matchfunding call

date-closed.description: Date when the matchfunding call was closed

date-opened.description: Date when the matchfunding call was opened

date-published.description: Date when the matchfunding call was published

date-succeeded.description: Date when the matchfunding call was succeeded

description.description: Full description for the matchfunding call

description-short.description: Short description for the matchfunding call

dossier.description: External links for the matchfunding call

facebook-url.description: URL of the Facebook page for the matchfunding call

image-background-url.description: URL for the main call image

image-url.description: URL for the main call image

image-url-big.description: URL for the main call image (big size)

legal.description: Some particular legal or conditions for the matchfunding call

owner.description: User ID of the call's owner

owner-name.description: User name of the call's owner

projects-active.description: Active projects (still with a running campaign) in this matchfunding call

projects-applied.description: Total number of projects effectively applicating to this matchfunding call

projects-succeeded.description: Projects funded in this matchfunding call

projects-total.description: Total number of projects included into this matchfunding call

resources.description: Text description of the available resources for the matchfunding call

scope.description: Scope of the matchfunding call, one of `local`, `regional`, `national`, `global` (or `null`)

sponsors.description: All available sponsors in a ordered list

status.description: Status of the call, one of `pending`, `editing`, `reviewing`, `applying`, `published`, `succeeded`, `expired`

translations.description: All available translations in a dictionary by language

tweet.description: Text used to make an automatic tweet to share the the matchfunding call

city.description: City location of the matchfunding call (language may vary)

country.description: Country name of the matchfunding call (language may vary)

country-code.description: Country code of the matchfunding call in [ISO 3166-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) format

radius.description: Radius (Km) of influence for the call (if any)

region.description: Region location of the matchfunding call (language may vary)

image-url.description: URL for the image/logo of the sponsor

*misc*.description: Every item of a translation will have the same structure as the parent object with the same fields (**and those fields only**) translated. Non translated items won't be displayed at all

amount.description: Currently achieved amount for the project

amount-call.description: Only the matchfunding part of the achieved amount for the project

date-created.description: Date when the project was created RFC822 format

date-published.description: Date when the project was published RFC822 format

image-url.description: URL with the main image of the project

minimum.description: Minimum amount to achieve to consider the project succeeded

node.description: Node where the project was created originally

optimum.description: Optimum amount to achieve for the project to achieve all his goals

amount-available.description: Available amount of cash to distribute among projects

amount-committed.description: Maximum total amount of cash that was available to distribute among projects

amount-peers.description: Amount of cash already distribute among projects

amount-remaining.description: Amount of cash still available for distribute among projects

call-location.description: Custom location value for the call

call-url.description: URL where to visualize the matchfunding call

date-opened.description: Date when the matchfunding call was opened

date-published.description: Date when the matchfunding call was published

date-succeeded.description: Date when the matchfunding call was succeeded

description-short.description: Short description for the matchfunding call

image-url.description: URL for the main call's image

owner.description: User ID of the call's owner

owner-name.description: User name of the call's owner

projects-active.description: Active projects (still with a running campaign) in this matchfunding call

projects-applied.description: Total number of projects effectively applicating to this matchfunding call

projects-succeeded.description: Projects funded in this matchfunding call

projects-total.description: Total number of projects included into this matchfunding call

radius.description: Radius (Km) of influence for the call (if any)

sponsors.description: All available sponsors in a ordered list

status.description: Status of the call, one of `pending`, `editing`, `reviewing`, `applying`, `published`, `succeeded`, `expired`

total-projects.description: Number of published projects in the category

total-users.description: Number of users interested in the category

total.description: Total elements available for the collection

*month/year*.description: The name of this field depends on the type of buckets generated, could be a month number or a year. The value will be the same object of the endpoint being requested

buckets.description:
An associative array where the key is an identifier of the period and the value is the content of the endpoint.
A digest generated for a whole year will return 12 buckets correspondig to each month of the year.
A digest generated without a year will return one buecket per each year of the Goteo's history

endpoint.description: The name of the endpoint used to digest

global.description: The content of the endpoint with the summarized data for all the buckets together

icon-url.description: URL for the image resource associated with this social commitment

total-projects.description: Number of published projects in the FootPrint

total-users.description: Number of users interested in the FootPrint

total.description: Total elements available for the collection

call-id.description: Id of the matchfunding call if this invest belongs to a invest in selected

conversion-ratio.description: Currency rate at the moment of the payment (relative to EUR)

currency.description: Currency of the contribution (currently one of `EUR`, `GBP`, `USD`) in [ISO 4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) format

date-charged.description: Date-only when the invest was charged in RFC822 format

date-created.description: Date-only when the invest was created in RFC822 format

date-returned.description: Date-only when the invest was returned (if applicable) in RFC822 format

date-updated.description: Date & Time when the invest was last updated in RFC822 format

matcher-id.description: Id of the matchfunding matcher if this invest belongs to a invest in selected

project.description: Id of the invest where applies the invests

resign.description: True if the user does not want any reward in exchango of the contribution

status.description: Status of the payment, one of `processing`, `pending`, `charged`, `cancelled`, `paid`, `returned`, `relocated`, `pool-returned`

type.description: Type of the payment, one of `payment`, `drop`, `pool`

country.description: Country name of the invest (language may vary)

country-code.description: Country code of the invest in [ISO 3166-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) format

region.description: Region location of the invest (language may vary)

calls.description: Number of matchfunding calls applying in the current query

pledged.description: Total sum pledged amount for the current query

projects.description: Total sum of projects applying in the current query

refunded.description: Total sum of refunded amount for the current query

required.description: Whether is an optional or not cost (optional costs count for the optimum project's amount)

about.description: About the project or his creators

amount.description: Currently achieved amount for the project

currency.description: Currency used in the project (ISO4217 Format)

currency-rate.description: Currency rate when the project was created (if was not EUR)

date-closed.description: Date when the project was closed (if was a failed project) RFC822 format

rewards.description: List of rewards for the project

social-commitment-id.description: SocialCommitment unique identifier of the project

country.description: Country name of the project (language may vary)

country-code.description: Country code of the project in [ISO 3166-1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2) format

region.description: Region location of the project (language may vary)

description.description: Description for the non-economical desired project's contribution

name.description: Name for the non-economical desired project's contribution

type.description: Type fot the non-economical necessity (one of `lend`, `task`)

amount.description: Minimum amount required for a invest to apply this reward

available-units.description: Reward's item units that are still available to choose.

license.description: Reward's associated license ID (if any, only for `type=social`)

license-description.description: Reward's associated license description (if any, only for `type=social`)

license-name.description: Reward's associated license name (if any, only for `type=social`)

license-svg-url.description: Reward's associated license SVG image URL resource (if any, only for `type=social`)

license-url.description: Reward's associated license URL containing its terms (if any, only for `type=social`)

*misc*.description:
Every item of a translation will have the same structure as the parent object with the same fields (**and those fields only**) translated. Non translated items won't be displayed at all.
**costs**, **rewards** and **needs** may be translated as well (in this case the translated array generated will use the ID as a key).

limit.description: Limit of results per page when retrieving a collection

page.description: Current page, `0` based (first page is zero)

sdg.description: Only if filtering by Sustainable Development Goal

total.description: Total elements available for the collection

date-created.description: Date when the project was created RFC822 format

date-published.description: Date when the project was published RFC822 format

image-url.description: URL with the main image of the project

latitude.description: Latitude coordinate for the project (if available)

longitude.description: Longitude coordinate for the project (if available)

minimum.description: Minimum amount to achieve to consider the project succeeded

node.description: Node where the project was created originally

optimum.description: Optimum amount to achieve for the project to achieve all his goals

social-commitment-id.description: SocialCommitment unique identifier of the project

percentage-users.description: Percentage of users in this category over the total number of users

users.description: Total number of users interested in the category

interactions.description: Karma number of the user collaborations

profile-image-url.description: URL with the avatar (image) of the user

average-collaborators.description: Average number of collaborators per succesful  project

average-donors.description: Average number of donors per successful project

cash-donors.description: Number of donors donanting to projects off-line

creators-collaborators.description: Number of creators collaborating with other  projects |

creators-donors.description: Number of creators funding other projects

creditcard-donors.description: Number of donors using a Credit Card

donors-collaborators.description: Number of donors who collaborate with others creators

leading-category.description: Category with the highest number of interested users

multidonors.description: Number of donors who donate to more than 1 project

percentage-donors-users.description: Percentage of registered users that are donors (*100 * donors / users*)

percentage-multidonor-donors.description: Percentage of multidonors (over total donors: *100 * multidonors / donors*)

percentage-multidonor-users.description: Percentage of multidonors (over total users: *100 * multidonors / users*)

percentage-unsubscribed-users.description: Percentage of unsubscribed users (over the  total number of users)

percentage-users-leading-category.description: Percentage of users in the leading category

percentage-users-second-category.description: Percentage of users in this category

top10-donors.description: The top 10 donors who spend more money on projects (the most generous co-financiers)

top10-multidonors.description: Top 10 multidonors who are contributed to more different projects (The most diversified co-financiers)

users-leading-category.description: Number of users in this category

users-second-category.description: Number of users in this category

amount.description: Total amount of money (€) spent by the user in projects

contributions.description: Total number of different projects the user has contributed to

profile-image-url.description: URL with the avatar (image) of the user

average-donation.description: Average amount of money (€) given by a donor

average-donation-paypal.description: Average amount of money (€) given by a donor using Paypal

average-failed.description: Average money raised for failed projects (which haven't reached the minimum required amount)

average-minimum.description: Average minimum cost (€) for successful projects

average-received.description: Average money raised (€) for successful projects (those which reached the minimum)

average-second-round.description: Average money raised only in the second round (€)

cash-amount.description: Total amount of money (€) collected by direct bank transfer

creditcard-amount.description: Total amount of money (€) raised using Credit Card transactions

matchfund-amount.description: Amount of money raised in calls (*Capital riego distribuido* + crowdfunding money)

matchfundpledge-amount.description: *Capital Riego de Goteo* (funds from institutions and companies added to the [Capital Riego](https://goteo.org/service/resources))

paypal-amount.description: Total amount of money (€) raised using PayPal transactions

percentage-pledged-failed.description: Percentage of money raised over the minimum on failed projects

percentage-pledged-successful.description: Percentage of money raised over the minimum on successful projects

pledged.description: Total amount of money (€) raised by Goteo

average-amount-successful.description: Average amount (€) of money raised in successful projects

average-posts-successful.description: Average number of posts published by successful projects

failed.description: Number of failed projects (unsuccessful crowdfunding campaigns)

percentage-successful-completed.description: Percentage of successful projects with completed campaign (over the total projects: *100 * successful-complete / (successful-complete + failed)*

published.description:
Number of published projects.
**Date filters** here uses the date where the project started its campaign

received.description:
Number of received projects (accepted for review by Goteo administrators).
**Date filters** here uses the date where the project was sent to revision

successful.description:
Number of successful projects (which have achieved the minimum required amount)
**Date filters** here uses the date where the had achieved the minimum amount

successful-completed.description:
Number of successful projects with completed campaign.
**Date filters** here uses the date where the project ended his campaign

top10-collaborations.description: The 10 campaigns with the most collaborations

top10-donations.description: The 10 campaigns with the most donors (individual contributions)

top10-receipts.description: The 10 campaigns with the most money raised

reward-refusal.description: Number of co-financiers who renounce reward

rewards-per-amount.description: Number of rewards picked by the users in steps

Number of published projects.

Number of successful projects (which have achieved the minimum required amount).

parameters.description: Filter by individual node(s). Multiple nodes can be specified. Restricts the list to the calls originally created in that node(s)
parameters.name: node

parameters.description: Filter by individual matchfunding call(s). Multiple calls can be specified. Restricts the list to the projects originally created in that call(s)
parameters.name: call

parameters.description: Filter by individual project(s). Multiple projects can be specified. Restricts the list to the calls that containing that projects
parameters.name: project

parameters.description: Get results by specified lang. Multiple langs can be specified
parameters.name: lang

parameters.description: Filter from date. Ex. "2013-01-01". Restricts the list to the calls published in that range
parameters.name: from_date

parameters.description: Filter until date.. Ex. "2014-01-01". Restricts the list to the calls published in that range
parameters.name: to_date

parameters.description: Filter by project category. Multiple categories can be specified. Restricts the list to the calls containing projects with interests in that category(ies)
parameters.name: category

parameters.description: Filter by project social commitment. Multiple social commitments can be specified. Restricts the list to the calls containing projects with that social commitment(s)
parameters.name: social_commitment

parameters.description: Filter by project Sustainable Development Goal. Multiple SDGs can be specified. Restricts the list to the calls containing projects with that SDG(s)
parameters.name: sdg

parameters.description: Filter by project footprint. Multiple footprints can be specified. Restricts the list to the calls containing projects with that footprint(s)
parameters.name: footprint

parameters.description: Filter by project location (Latitude,longitude,Radius in Km). Restricts the list to the calls with projects geolocated in that area
parameters.name: location

parameters.description: Page number (starting at 1) if the result can be paginated
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: Page limit (maximum 50 results, defaults to 10) if the result can be paginated
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Unique ID for the call
parameters.name: call_id

parameters.description: Unique ID for the call
parameters.name: call_id

parameters.description: Filter by individual node(s). Multiple nodes can be specified. Restricts the list to the users originally created in that node(s)
parameters.name: node

parameters.description: Filter by individual matchfunding call(s). Multiple calls can be specified. Restricts the list to the projects originally created in that call(s)
parameters.name: call

parameters.description: Get results by specified lang. Multiple langs can be specified
parameters.name: lang

parameters.description: Filter from date. Ex. "2013-01-01". Restricts the list to the users created in that range
parameters.name: from_date

parameters.description: Filter until date.. Ex. "2014-01-01". Restricts the list to the users created in that range
parameters.name: to_date

parameters.description: Filter by call category. Multiple categories can be specified. Restricts the list to the users that have interests in that category(ies)
parameters.name: category

parameters.description: Filter by call social commitment. Multiple social commitments can be specified. Restricts the list to the users that have interests in that social commitment(s)
parameters.name: social_commitment

parameters.description: Page number (starting at 1) if the result can be paginated
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: Page limit (maximum 50 results, defaults to 10) if the result can be paginated
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Filter by individual node(s). Multiple nodes can be specified. Restricts the list to the categories used in projects assigned in that nodes
